author: cnbc.com
title: Richard Vaughn and Nicholas Waddell, Director of Channel Sales at SecurityFirst, Recognized as 2018 CRN® Channel Chief
text:
RANCHO SANTA MARGARITA, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- SecurityFirst , a provider of data-centric cyber solutions, announced today that CRN ® , a brand of The Channel Company , has named Richard Vaughn and Nicholas Waddell, both Director of Channel Sales at SecurityFirst, to its prestigious list of 2018 Channel Chiefs. The executives on this annual list represent top leaders in the IT channel who excel at driving growth and revenue in their organization through channel partners.
Channel Chief honorees are selected by CRN’s editorial staff on the basis of their professional achievements, standing in the industry, dedication to the channel partner community, and strategies for driving future growth and innovation. Each of the 2018 Channel Chiefs has demonstrated loyalty and ongoing support for the IT channel by consistently promoting, defending and executing outstanding channel partner programs.
Vaughn is an industry veteran with an impressive 30-year career implementing and driving successful channel programs for the IT industry. Previously, he was with Toshiba America Information Systems, where he led the channel sales team since 2004, and named US Channel Chief in 2014. In 2016, he was recognized by CRN Magazine as one of the Top 50 Most Influential Channel Chiefs.
Waddell has worked in sales management and business development for nearly 35-years, operating across the entire spectrum of the channel partner community, developing channel programs, strategic relationships and alliances. Prior to SecurityFirst, he worked for Cylance Inc., developing the strategic channel initiative and programs for their Cybersecurity Consulting Services offerings, and also Ingram Micro, where he built the vertical business model, structure and vertical market channel programs, nearly tripling the business in four years.
“Building on our success delivering data protection to key OEM customers, we’re serious about creating a robust channel for our DataKeep offering,” said Jim Varner, CEO of SecurityFirst. “Richard and Nick bring the kind of talent SecurityFirst needs to recruit major distributors and managed service providers to our platform. The era of data-centric security solutions is now upon us, and our complete, software-only solution helps to add a critical layer of data security protection to the stack while complementing any security portfolio with file and volume data protection.”
“The executives on CRN’s 2018 Channel Chiefs list stand out for their exceptional leadership, vision and commitment to the channel,” said Robert Faletra, Executive Chairman of The Channel Company. “These individuals deserve special recognition for their development and support of robust partner programs, innovative business strategy and significant contribution to the overall health of a vigorously growing channel. We applaud each Channel Chief’s impressive record of accomplishments and look forward to their future successes.”
The 2018 CRN Channel Chiefs list, including the 50 Most Influential Channel Chiefs, is featured online at www.crn.com/channelchiefs and will appear in the February 2018 issue of CRN.

About SecurityFirst
SecurityFirst provides innovative and affordable software solutions that protect one of the world’s most valuable assets – digital data. SecurityFirst specializes in data-centric cyber solutions that provide cryptographic splitting across a range of security options for robust data security and policy-defined access controls – all intended to meet the growing mandate for data privacy.
About The Channel Company
The Channel Company enables breakthrough IT channel performance with our dominant media, engaging events, expert consulting and education and innovative marketing services and platforms. As the channel catalyst, we connect and empower technology suppliers, solution providers and end users. Backed by more than 30 years of unequalled channel experience, we draw from our deep knowledge to envision innovative new solutions for ever-evolving challenges in the technology marketplace. www.thechannelco.com
